description:
The Devil Bats meet the captain of the Hashiratani Deers, Yamamoto Onihei. The Devil Bats go watch the Deers game against the Kyoshin Poseidon in order to see the team that might become their future opponents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Argento ossidato, lo spirito della linea!
The Refined Spirit of a Lineman!
